tool_description: Unlock boundless connectivity with D7API Gateway, seamlessly connecting you to the world's vast messaging network through D7's exclusive network access
name: D7 WhatsApp
title: D7 WhatsApp

api_list.name: D7API - Check Balance
api_list.description: Retrieve details about your D7API account's current balance.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://d7-whatsapp.p.rapidapi.com/messages/v1/balance"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "d7-whatsapp.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://d7-whatsapp.p.rapidapi.com/messages/v1/balance"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "d7-whatsapp.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
